Quickstrike:




Quickstrike picked himself up and glowered down on Shredder's unconscious 
body. He lightly kicked his side and walked away. That'll teach him to pick 
a fight with him. He went on his way. He wondered if any of his comrades 
were here. He wondered where Sinesis was. Perhaps he was away looking for 
Silverstyke.

He mused lightly to himself. Maybe there was a bot to accompany him. Maybe 
that new bot. Mantella, he recalled.

He lifted his comm-link to his mouth plate. "Mantella, ya there?"
